title: AMBIENT SOUNDSCAPES by serot.one
description: 10 LOOPABLE ambient soundscapes to set the mood in your game.
longDescription:
Preview: SoundCloud


10 LOOPABLE ambient soundscapes to set the mood in your game.


Professionally mixed and mastered at an industry standard -23 LUFS.


We created a variety of soundscapes for different scenarios that can loop seamlessly.


Every imported Sound Wave file has a referenced Sound Cue file.


Import these songs into your project to get started.


Enjoy and thank you for supporting our hard work!


-serot.one










keywords: dark neuromancer science fiction film noir dystopia cybernetics artificial intelligence post modernism anime manga blade runner steampunk shadowrun cyberpunk ghost in the shell akira dystopian cyberspace anti-hero detective fiction neo noir video game postmodern ambient wind beach cavern dungeon castle kingdom ruins desert machina graveyard night city aaa triple a
